analyzed: @62b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sgrub pa po la 'tshe ba'i @63a * //🔽gnod pa sna tshogs rengs par byed do //🔽lus kyi gnod pa'i nus pa dang bral bar 'dod na /🔽sarba ku lam aa brta ya h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas ce spyang gi khrag la bsngags nas gtor nam mo'i gdon rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //🔽sarba aa tsa le h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag bdun bzlas nas zangs phye la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags la gtor na gcan gzan khro bo rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa po la 'tshe ba'i @63a * // gnod pa sna tshogs rengs par byed do // lus kyi gnod pa'i nus pa dang bral bar 'dod na / sarba ku lam aa brta ya h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas ce spyang gi khrag la bsngags nas gtor nam mo'i gdon rnams rengs par 'gyur ro // sarba aa tsa le h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag bdun bzlas nas zangs phye la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags la gtor na gcan gzan khro bo rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites the mantra🔽sarva-kulam avartāya hum hum nine hundred thousand times, and then incants a jackal's blood and scatters it, the grahas of the night will be paralyzed.🔽If one recites the mantra sarva-acale hum hum seven hundred thousand times, and then incants copper filings one hundred and eight times and scatters it, the ferocious beasts will be paralyzed.

original: sarba n'a sha ya phu: h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag lnga bzlas nas gla rtsi la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na sbrul rengs par nges so //
analyzed: sarba n'a sha ya phu: h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag lnga bzlas nas gla rtsi la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na sbrul rengs par nges so //
translated: If one recites the mantra sarva-naśaya pūḥ hum hum five hundred thousand times, and then incants musk one hundred and eight times and scatters it, the snakes will be paralyzed.

original: sarba dusht'am badzra aa ka jva la ya h'um h'um zhes bsnyen pa 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas sa dang chul sogs pa la brgyad rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na 'byung po'i gdon rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sarba dusht'am badzra aa ka jva la ya h'um h'um zhes bsnyen pa 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas sa dang chul sogs pa la brgyad rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na 'byung po'i gdon rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Sarva dushtan vajra akha jabhala ya hum hum - having recited this mantra nine hundred thousand times, if one recites it eight times over earth, water, and so forth, and scatters it, the spirit-demonic influences will be paralyzed.

original: sarba ma h'a mi ni du ru du ru h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas yungs kar dang yungs nag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags nas gtor na gdon thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sarba ma h'a mi ni du ru du ru h'um h'um zhes 'bum phrag dgu bzlas nas yungs kar dang yungs nag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags nas gtor na gdon thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Sarva maha minidurudur hum hum - having recited this mantra nine hundred thousand times, if one recites it twenty-one times over white mustard seeds and black mustard seeds, and scatters it, all demonic influences will be paralyzed.

original: sarba aa mu ka m'a ra ya h'um h'um phat ces 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas nas rkun ma'i rjes sa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na rkun ma rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sarba aa mu ka m'a ra ya h'um h'um phat ces 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas nas rkun ma'i rjes sa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas gtor na rkun ma rnams rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Sarva amuka mara ya hum hum phat - having recited this mantra eleven hundred thousand times, if one recites it one hundred and eight times over the earth of a thief's footprints, and scatters it, the thieves will be paralyzed.

original: bsgrub bya rengs pa'i las sna tshogs pa bstan pa rlung gi zhags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: bsgrub bya rengs pa'i las sna tshogs pa bstan pa rlung gi zhags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The various rites for paralyzing the one to be subdued, called the Wind-Rope, composed by the master Jnanavajra, is complete.
